Package de.intranda.digiverso.presentation.model.cms

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CMSCollection
    A class representing persistent configurations for a collection.
    CMSContentItem
    This class represents both template content configuration items and instance items of actual pages.
    CMSContentItemTemplate
    A contentItem to be used in a CMSPage template.
    CMSMediaItem  
    CMSMediaItemMetadata  
    CMSNavigationItem  
    CMSNavigationManager  
    CMSPage  
    CMSPage.PageComparator  
    CMSPageLanguageVersion
    Content instance of a CMS page for a particular language.
    CMSPageLanguageVersionComparator
    Sorts CMSPageLanguageVersions so that the version for the given locale is at the beginning of the Collection, followed by the given defaultLocale, followed by the English and German locale, followed by all others in alphabetical order.
    CMSPageTemplate
    Page templates are read from XML configuration files and are not stored in the DB.
    CMSProperty  
    CMSSidebarElement  
    CMSSidebarElementWithQuery  
    CMSSidebarElementWithSearch  
    CMSSidebarManager  
    CMSStaticPage

    PageList  
    SelectableNavigationItem
    A CMSNavigationItem which can be selected and deselected.
    Translation
    A persistence object holding a translated String value
